item.title: Top 10 Best 50 Inch 4k Tv 2020
item.description: This is our list of the best newly released 50-59 inch 4k TVs in 2020 Image Model Display Resolution Smart TV Connectivity LG OLED55GX6LA 55-inch OLED 4K webOS 4 x HDMI, 3 x USB, WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0 Samsung QE55Q90TATXXU 55-inch QLED 4K Tizen 2 x HDMI, 2 x USB, WiFi, Bluetooth 4.
